meanings.sent1: I chose a beautiful wallpapers for my bedroom walls.
meanings.sent2: The wallpapers in the living room have a floral pattern.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the wallpapers on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed off the wallpapers, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The wallpapers with the forest scene made the room feel like a magical forest.

meanings.definition: A digital image used as the background on a computer or smartphone screen.
meanings.sent1: I changed my wallpapers to a picture of my family.
meanings.sent2: The wallpapers on my phone is a photo of a sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cat pawed at the wallpapers on the screen, trying to catch the moving fish.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were fixed on the wallpapers, lost in the beauty of the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant wallpapers on her laptop screen brightened up her day.
